skill.flavor: Nightingale's commanding personality makes her a natural leader.
skill.name: Ambitious
skill.text: All other allies Gaiin +1 SP. Nightingale Gains +2 SP

skill.flavor: Zeke's cautious nature helps him to adapt to any situation.
skill.name: Nimble Fighter
skill.text: Once per turn, Zeke may re-roll his Dodge roll.

skill.flavor: Rook's Advancement granted him an unearthly amount of stamina and strength.
skill.name: Grand Physique
text: Rook may equip an additional Consumable.
Rook ignores the negative to movement from the first instance of HEAVY he has equipped.

skill.flavor: Remi's shady past has given her insight.
skill.name: Shady Training
skill.text: Move 1 space in any direction (including diagonally).

skill.flavor: Remi is gifted with feathered wings that allow her to fly.
skill.name: Avian Flight
skill.text: Make a MOVE. Remi has Flight for the duration of this movement. This Ability may only be used if Remi has less Damage than half of her total HP.
